## Hello

I’m a PhD student in Educational Psychology at the University of Minnesota.

I’m fascinated by how people make sense of information in today’s digital world, and how AI can help. In the [Reading + Learning Lab](https://edpsych.umn.edu/research/labs/reading-learning), where I work with Dr. Panayiota Kendeou. I'm currently studying how students use AI to build knowledge and better understand complex texts.

Beyond research, I'm the [Instructional Technology Fellow](https://academics.cehd.umn.edu/digital-education/yewon-kang/) for the School of Social Work. I work directly with faculty, guiding them in leveraging technology to enhance teaching and develop accessible, engaging course sites.
